name: Rachita Gupta
wishText: Abb koi lecture nhi just enjoy your life to the fullest and always keep smiling
text1: So Happiest Birthday to you bro. God Bless you always!!!
textInChatBox: Wishing you good health and happiness. I pray that you continue to be the wonderful person that you are and get everything you have ever dreamed of in your life.  You deserve everything that u ever wish for and I hope all your wishes come true this year. You are such a beautiful soul and a lovely human being. Such a strong girl bro and on and on and on...
text2: Pehle m sirf aisa h kch krne wala tha bs, ek senti sa text
text4: Tumne bol bol kr dimag kha liya tha ki koi kch special nhi krta, Socha m h kr lu thodi mehnat mtlb ho ske toh kch
outroText: There's celebration and a messege for you in the next one!
